Title: CThru and SilverUnit
Description:
C-Thru is an AOP interception framework based on the Typemock Open-AOP API.
It allows creating interception and isolation frameworks for logging, testing and many other things very simply.

Cthru-Silverlight: allows true unit testing in Silverlight.
HomeWiki:
What is CThru?

CThru is a collection of open source projects, all on the Typemock Open-AOP API. In currently includes:
  • The CThru Engine (core on which other project are developed)
    • SilverUnit
    • FluentAop

SilverUnit

SilverUnit allows true unit testing in Silverlight.
SilverUnit is the first framework that introduces the concept of Crosswise-Isolation: Isolation concepts can be performed for all objects and calls in the system.
  • See some SilverUnit examples
  • Understanding the SilverUnit source code

CThru

CThru is an AOP interception framework based on the Typemock Open-AOP API.
It allows creating interception and isolation frameworks for logging, testing and many other things very simply.
Using CThru you can create Domain Specific Isolation Platforms such as CThru-Silverlight (SilverUnit)

Learn

  • See how CThru can add Ruby style abilities to VB.NET
  • What are Crosswise-Isolation, Isolation Aspects and Domain Specific Isolation Platforms
  • Using the CThru Engine
  • Understanding the CThru.sln Source Code
